item.title: Canadian Museum of History Visit
item.description: Please note that this course website is equipped with the Hypothes.is annotation layer. If anything below requires clarification or sparks a thought, please highlight the relevant text and leave an annotation in our class Hypothesis group. Please also, if you spot someone has left an annotation, read their annotation and respond appropriately and helpfully if you can. January 20th, Visit to the Candian Museum of History If you missed our trip on the 20th, you missed a real treat.
